de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.relation

Class AbstractRelation<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.AbstractHierarchicalResult
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.relation.AbstractRelation<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Data type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, Relation<O>, HierarchicalResult, Result
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvertToStringView, DBIDView, MaterializedDoubleRelation, MaterializedRelation, ProjectedView, ProxyView

    public abstract class AbstractRelation<O>
extends AbstractHierarchicalResult
implements Relation<O>
    Abstract base class for relations.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • getKNNQuery

        public KNNQuery<O> getKNNQuery(DistanceQuery<O> distanceQuery,
                               Object... hints)
        Description copied from interface: Relation
        Get a KNN query object for the given distance query. When possible, this will use an index, but it may default to an expensive linear scan. Hints include:
        • Integer: maximum value for k needed
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Specified by:
        getKNNQuery in interface Relation<O>
        Parameters:
        distanceQuery - Distance query
        hints - Optimizer hints (optional)
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getRangeQuery

        public RangeQuery<O> getRangeQuery(DistanceQuery<O> distanceQuery,
                                   Object... hints)
        Description copied from interface: Relation
        Get a range query object for the given distance query. When possible, this will use an index, but it may default to an expensive linear scan. Hints include:
        • Distance object: Maximum query range
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Specified by:
        getRangeQuery in interface Relation<O>
